channel.title: Dragon Scimitar
channel.description: this is a better version i think of jagex's dragon scimitar made by me :P here's pics of it and the last pic is what i based it off of

item.title: Dragon Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @austinl28 austinl28
item.description:
@austinl28 wrote:

sorry if its a poly overkill i used the mesh smoothing 4 lol and i dont like jagex’s blade i like the handle just not the blade i think the blade is crappy but thats my opinion ever heard of freedom of speech? well it means i can tell my opinion im sorry if i offended you guys by saying theirs was crappy its just i like wicked looking blades and btw any1 help me put this on my server? i have team viewer its just everytime i add in the model and do the ints and spawn it freezes my client then i have 2 delete it from my inv through my files or everytime i log in that acc it freezes plz help???

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:10, topic:387228”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=483030.msg3537798#msg3537798 date=1300653035]

is beter than his but that’s just my opinion
i can understand you like to use non jagex work but still

Is it bad if i think that the blade on the jagex dragon scimitar looks poorly done? O.o
[/quote]no it isn’t
different people have different opinions, the world would be boring if we all liked the same thing[/quote]
Well thats good to hear, atleast mi not goign crazy.

item.title: Dragon Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:6, topic:387228”]look austin it may be that you find your own “amature” work better than the work of the jagex professionals,
but serious? do you really think that is better than the new jagex one?[/quote]
Personally, id rather have this sword design then the jagex scimitar design. Just if someone “pro” were to make it, but thats just my opinion.

item.title: Dragon Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

You and i sir, need to have a talk. I see you added a sharp edge to this one, but the handle is a poly overkill. You’re moving the wires everywhere which is making the wireframe look messy, try do what i showed you without moving the wires out of line with eachother. Good job, keep up the good work.

Read full topic
